text: @green_realist @semiwittybrad @SwitchAtoll @twpolk @florian_krammer @chrislhayes The goal is to stomp out the virus. Come on. The goal isn't to infect billions of people around the globe.  You want to talk draining our savings? Herd immunity is almost always used to model what percentage of a population needs to be vaccinated to prevent virus spread.
